meanings.definition: Used to imitate the sound of a sneeze.
meanings.sent1: Atishoo! The little girl pretended to sneeze during the play.
meanings.sent2: When the pepper made him sneeze, he exclaimed, 'Atishoo!'
meanings.sent3: At the funny movie, the audience burst into laughter when the character shouted 'Atishoo!' for no reason.
meanings.sent4: The wind blew through the trees, making them rustle and whisper 'Atishoo.'
meanings.sent5: The magician's trick involved a fake sneeze, with a loud 'Atishoo!' to distract the audience.

meanings.definition: An exclamation used to express surprise or disbelief.
meanings.sent1: Atishoo! I can't believe how fast the car is going!
meanings.sent2: When she saw the surprise party, she gasped, 'Atishoo!'
meanings.sent3: As the magician pulled a rabbit out of the hat, the audience collectively shouted 'Atishoo!' in shock.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected plot twist in the movie made everyone in the theater exclaim 'Atishoo!'
meanings.sent5: The sudden thunderstorm took everyone by surprise, eliciting a loud 'Atishoo!' from the crowd.
